summary: Completed testing of Daily Reminders feature and Start/End of Day renaming. All requested features are working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/auth/me returns daily_reminders field (boolean)
Backend: PUT /api/auth/settings updates daily_reminders to true
Backend: PUT /api/auth/settings updates daily_reminders to false
Backend: Settings update persists in database (verified via GET /api/auth/me)
Backend: POST /api/cron/send-daily-reminders endpoint exists and returns response
Backend: Cron endpoint processes users with daily_reminders enabled
Backend: Login response includes daily_reminders in user object
Backend: Blog entries have views field with initial value 0
Backend: Library entries have views field with initial value 0
Backend: Public blog entries show 0 views initially
Frontend: Dashboard shows 'Start of Day Items' (renamed from 'Morning Startup')
Frontend: Dashboard shows 'End of Day Items' (renamed from 'Evening Shutdown')
Frontend: Old names 'Morning Startup' and 'Evening Shutdown' are NOT present on Dashboard
Frontend: Routines page shows 'Start of Day' tab (renamed from 'Startup')
Frontend: Routines page shows 'End of Day' tab (renamed from 'Shutdown')
Frontend: Routines page shows 'Start of Day Items' card title
Frontend: Routines page shows 'End of Day Items' card title
Frontend: Settings page has Notifications section
Frontend: Settings page has 'Daily Reminders' toggle with data-testid
Frontend: Daily Reminders toggle works correctly (enable/disable)
Frontend: Daily Reminders description mentions 'Start of Day items, daily tasks, and End of Day items'
Frontend: Public project page shows '0 views' for entries with no views
Frontend: Public project page increments view count when entry is viewed
critical_code_review_comments: Note: Email sending is configured but SMTP_HOST not set in env, so emails are logged to console instead of being sent. This is expected development behavior.
seed_data_creation: Created and cleaned up TEST_Public_Blog_Entry for view count testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features are working: 1) Dashboard shows 'Start of Day Items' and 'End of Day Items' (renamed from Morning Startup/Evening Shutdown), 2) Routines page shows 'Start of Day' and 'End of Day' tabs, 3) Settings page has Daily Reminders toggle in Notifications section with proper description, 4) PUT /api/auth/settings updates daily_reminders field, 5) GET /api/auth/me returns daily_reminders field, 6) POST /api/cron/send-daily-reminders endpoint exists and processes users with reminders enabled, 7) Public project page shows '0 views' for entries with no views and increments on view. Email sending is MOCKED (SMTP_HOST not configured) - emails are logged to console.
